mention_address: "Main Beach, South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, Orange County, California, 92651, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Great photo pop with the iconic lifeguard tower. Lots of volley ball nets. Nice waves great for a day at the beach. Several restaurants close by.

Visit the beaches, but stay for the food at Lagunas amazing restaurants.
